itemDisplayName: Based on Deploy a Linux VM Scale Set with a Custom Script Extension but in master slave architecture ( version create a new virtual network in Azure)
description: This template allows you to deploy a VM Scale Set of Linux VMs. These VMs have a custom script extension for customization and are behind a load balancer with NAT rules for rdp connections. This allows to specify the master node number and data node number, adapt to any master / slave architecture
